Today we are outside Siem Reap and we are

The most fascinating thing about Bayon are
the cold faces that have a hint of a smile.

This massive complex has 54 towers with 216
faces on them.
Over here we have the Terrace of the Elephants.

This was once used as a viewing platform from
where you could watch the ceremonies that

Well, we're traveling right now in Cambodia
in April and it is the hottest time of the

It is always hot in Cambodia but this is literally
the worst month.

As a tip for people coming here - if you want
to come at bit of a cooler time from December

to January or even February it is a great
time to come.

It is also peak season here so you will be
